name: Cathy Ray's Tubular Training
description:
This game was made over the course of 72 hours for Mini Jam 125!

You play as the adorable robo Cathy in a wonderful digital world, shooting at creatures as your creator, Cheese, wants you to train to become the best lil' silly robot you can be.

Every creature spawn, every effect, everything is synced to the rhythm, using a wonderful soundtrack composed by WangleLine. And who knows - maybe at the end of the stage you'll meet a boss which syncs every attack to the rhythm!

Known bugs (that we didn't have the time to find or fix):

  • The game is very prone to memory leaks after long amounts of playtime
  • During Sai's cutscene, accidentally standing directly in her hitbox will quite definitely kill you
  • The web version is a bit laggy on some browsers, download the game if experiencing issues.

Credits:

  • Maggie - art, design
  • oatmealine - programming, design
  • WangleLine - soundtrack, used under CC BY-SA
  • YellowAfterlife - fonts
